Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Detroit in 2017...
Injured on 4/27/2017 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/29/2017 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2018, off Ivan Castilla (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2018, off Jorge Rubio (ATL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2018, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 6/14/2019 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2019...
Traded from Detroit to Houston on 5/11/2020 (Going to HOU: 2B James Goodridge, 3B James Truman. Going to DET: P Rodney Schloss)...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against New York on 7/8/2020...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,328,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/26/2021 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
